author: ChromedCat
title: Not very special but still cool
review:
I recently bought this set for 22.90 sgd and apparently it's not available in the us yet and some other countries. It's seems to be only available in some parts of Asia and uk eu. 
 

I bought this set mostly for the cool mini figures and that it included (5!!) dynamite sticks and (4!!) dollar bills which is insane for a set this size

the minfigures were quite good but not exclusive. This set also includes 4 bat boomerangs which I'm sure Batman can't hold all at once 

the rubber duck build was pretty lame and boring 

Anyway, for $15 usd you can get much better sets in other themes and figures are not exclusive anyway so you can pass this

author: c05
title: A nice little pack!
review:
This is a simple, but nice little pack if you aren't too deep into a Lego Batman collection yet. The Penguin's duck was what really drew me to it but even aside from that you get a solid basic Batman figurine and an expressive Harley with a funny expression. I did notice that Harley's hairpiece doesn't completely cover her alternate face on the back, but it's a good figure. You get quite a number of extra props, 4 batarangs, 2 money safes, and 3 extra dynamite packs which can add some props to a play scenario or give some flair to a scene.

Value-wise I think it's good for a simple kit, though considering you can get a Speed Champions kit for $15 which has more build time and parts you may want to see if this one goes on sale for $10 or so. If you already have these characters, there's probably not much reason to get this but it's a solid starter and I liked that it had some flair for such a miniature kit.

author: StevenTheBrick
title: Batman Vs. The Penguin & Harley Quinn
review:
2/5

It's a meh price, due to being $15 for 3 minifigures you're likely to find in other sets. However, I do give it points for giving some good versions of the characters. Meh playability as it comes from the accessories, which aren't very exciting. The building experience was lacking as the Penguin's Duck Vehicle wasn't built greatly. The parts are ok however, but could've been better.
